data.message:
Eminem  Someone messed with me gettin through school and Just Lose It inspired me to write them a message and I really wanted to show you. Hope you see this
This message was made possible by "Just Lose It"                Back to class class class
Back again -gain -gain
Goin back back back 
Not over till the end end end

Now you thought that you could get me
You could trick me
You kinda did trick me
I know your reasons
It's the season
Just go
I'm an asshole
So appeasin

Now I'm gonna make you dance
Deal whoop ass
A little free-lance
Or school teachin
That's my reason
Just go
You're so stupid
Self appeasin

Snapped right back back back
Back again -gain -gain
Kiss my ass ass ass
Tell a friend friend friend
